thread.title: CTC Media Sells 75% Stake to UTH Russia
thread.title_full: CTC Media Sells 75% Stake to UTH Russia - WSJ

author: Olga Razumovskaya
title: CTC Media Sells 75% Stake to UTH Russia
text:
MOSCOW—Russian broadcaster CTC Media said on Friday it had agreed to sell a 75% stake in its operating business to a company controlled by Russian billionaire Alisher Usmanov, bringing CTC into line with a law that restricts foreign ownership of domestic media outlets.
Sweden’s Modern Times Group and foreign minority shareholders will receive $200 million from an affiliate of UTH Russia, part-owned by Mr. Usmanov, and $55 million of...
